mapper.insert: INSERT INTO breply(rno, rcomment, bno, userid, nickname, wdate, grpno, indent, ansnum) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(rno), 0)+1 as rno FROM breply), #{rcomment}, #{bno}, #{userid} , #{nickname}, sysdate, #{grpno}, 0, 0)

INSERT INTO breply(rno, rcomment, bno, userid, nickname, wdate, grpno, indent, ansnum) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(rno), 0)+1 as rno FROM breply), #{rcomment}, #{bno}, #{userid} , #{nickname}, sysdate, #{grpno}, #{indent}, #{ansnum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM breply WHERE rno in ( SELECT rply.rno FROM breply rply, (SELECT bno, grpno, indent, rno, ansnum FROM breply WHERE rno = #{rno}) cmt WHERE rply.bno = cmt.bno and rply.grpno = cmt.grpno and rply.indent >= cmt.indent and rply.rno >= cmt.rno and rply.ansnum >= cmt.ansnum)
